name: mysqli_set_charset
purpose: Sets the default client character set

return.description: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

notes.description:
To use this function on a Windows platform you need MySQL client library
    version 4.1.11 or above (for MySQL 5.0 you need 5.0.6 or above).

This is the preferred way to change the charset. Using
    mysqli::query to execute SET NAMES ..
    is not recommended.
